name: Personalized Stainless Steel Engraved Heart Envelope Pendant

reviews.name: Personalized Stainless Steel Engraved Heart Envelope Pendant
reviews.reviewText: It was not what I had expected. It was bigger than I thought it would be which is a plus. The down fall is that the engraving is not actually on the necklace itself and only the top piece snaps open. I thought the whole heart unfolded and that the engraved part was going to be on the inside center of the piece. Instead it was engraved on a separate piece of super super paper thin metal that could easily be bent if not handled with delicated touch. Also it is very easy to get lost. If the top pops open than your special engraved message is gone forever because it falls out real easy. So I would not purchase this again and would not have purchased at all if I had known that. I would either have waited until they did it like I had expected or found one elsewhere that engraved on the actual pendant.
reviews.title: Reviews are Important!

reviews.name: Personalized Stainless Steel Engraved Heart Envelope Pendant
reviews.reviewText: This was one of my many presents from my boyfriend for Christmas. It looks exactly like it does in the picture, but shines like a diamond!! It is a lot bigger then expected which is a plus. Anytime I wear it people always compliment and want to see the message, which is no problem to me. I love this necklace, and believe it would be a wonderful heartfelt gift for girls of all ages.
reviews.title: In love!!

reviews.name: Personalized Stainless Steel Engraved Heart Envelope Pendant
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our daughter's first birthday as a keepsake! It looks exactly like it does online.
reviews.title: Loved it!
